sentences.english: The results of our study provide important references for other schools that are debating whether to implement the small-group tutorial teaching strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本研究結果可做爲其他院校推動小班敎學初期之參考。

sentences.english: Cover Title Papers collection of the International Law School Deans ' Conference on Legal Education for the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 21世紀法學敎育曁國際法學院校長硏討會論文集。

sentences.english: First, they communicated directly with her parents- in-law about the concept of education.
sentences.chinese: 而母親的反應，一是直接與公婆溝通自己的敎養觀念。

definition: (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another, abbr. for 薪盡火傳|薪尽火传[xin1 jin4 huo3 chuan2]
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
to strengthen moral ties between people/to have sexual intercourse (of a married couple)
School of Mind/Neo-Confucian Idealistic School (from Song to mid-Qing times, c. 1000-1750, typified by the teachings of Wang Yangming 王陽明|王阳明[Wang2 Yang2 ming2])
madder (Rubia cordifolia)/to hunt for/to gather/to collect
to slander/to defame/to speak ill of
